section.title: Interface introduction
section.para:
The Globus implementation of the GridFTP server draws on:
three IETF RFCs:
RFC 959
RFC 2228
RFC 2389
an IETF Draft: MLST-16
the GridFTP protocol specification, which is Global Grid Forum (GGF) Standard GFD.020.

section.title: Syntax of the interface
section.para: The command line tools and the client library completely hide the details of the protocol from the user and the developer. Unless you choose to use the control library, it is not necessary to have a detailed knowledge of the protocol.
